title: Cross-sell - Add a Tablet Line
description: A customer with a mobile phone plan wants to add a new line for their tablet.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and present the available data-only plans for tablets.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the tablet plan options.

tasks.description: Explain how the tablet line will be billed alongside their existing phone plan.
Process the order to add the tablet line to the customer's account.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds the new service line.
